verses.verse: And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his stead, and <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> himself against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And he <S%H5414>placed<s%> <S%H2428>forces<s%> in all the <S%H1219>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H5333>garrisons<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, which <S%H609>Asa<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H3920>taken<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was with <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%>, because he <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H1875>sought<s%> not unto <S%H1168>Baalim<s%>; of: or, of his father, and of David
But <S%H1875>sought<s%> to the LORD <S%H430>God<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H1980>walked<s%> in his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, and not after the <S%H4639>doings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Therefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3559>stablished<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and all <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H5414>brought<s%> to <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H4503>presents<s%>; and he had <S%H6239>riches<s%> and <S%H3519>honour<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance<s%>. brought: Heb. gave

And his <S%H3820>heart<s%> was lifted <S%H1361>up<s%> in the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: moreover he took <S%H5493>away<s%> the high <S%H1116>places<s%> and <S%H842>groves<s%> out of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>. was: that is, was encouraged

Also in the <S%H7969>third<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> to his <S%H8269>princes<s%>, even to <S%H1134>Benhail<s%>, and to <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%>, and to <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%>, and to <S%H5417>Nethaneel<s%>, and to <S%H4322>Michaiah<s%>, to <S%H3925>teach<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

And with them he sent <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, even <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%>, and <S%H5418>Nethaniah<s%>, and <S%H2069>Zebadiah<s%>, and <S%H6214>Asahel<s%>, and <S%H8070>Shemiramoth<s%>, and <S%H3083>Jehonathan<s%>, and <S%H138>Adonijah<s%>, and <S%H2900>Tobijah<s%>, and <S%H2899>Tobadonijah<s%>, <S%H3881>Levites<s%>; and with them <S%H476>Elishama<s%> and <S%H3088>Jehoram<s%>, <S%H3548>priests<s%>.

And they <S%H3925>taught<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and had the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with them, and went <S%H5437>about<s%> throughout all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H3925>taught<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> fell upon all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>lands<s%> that were round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, so that they made no <S%H3898>war<s%> against <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%>. fell: Heb. was

Also some of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H4503>presents<s%>, and <S%H4853>tribute<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%>; and the <S%H6163>Arabians<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> him <S%H6629>flocks<s%>, <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>, and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> he <S%H8495>goats<s%>.

And <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat<s%> <S%H1980>waxed<s%> <S%H1432>great<s%> <S%H4605>exceedingly<s%>; and he <S%H1129>built<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1003>castles<s%>, and <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4543>store<s%>. castles: or, palaces

And he had <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H4399>business<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>: and the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valour<s%>, were in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And these are the <S%H6486>numbers<s%> of them according to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>: Of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%>; <S%H5734>Adnah<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%>, and with him mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valour<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.
And <S%H3027>next<s%> to him was <S%H3076>Jehohanan<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%>, and with him two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>. next: Heb. at his hand

And <S%H3027>next<s%> him was <S%H6007>Amasiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2147>Zichri<s%>, who willingly <S%H5068>offered<s%> himself unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; and with him two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valour<s%>.

And of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>; <S%H450>Eliada<s%> a mighty <S%H1368>man<s%> of <S%H2428>valour<s%>, and with him armed <S%H5401>men<s%> with <S%H7198>bow<s%> and <S%H4043>shield<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.
And <S%H3027>next<s%> him was <S%H3075>Jehozabad<s%>, and with him an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> ready <S%H2502>prepared<s%> for the <S%H6635>war<s%>.
These <S%H8334>waited<s%> on the <S%H4428>king<s%>, beside those whom the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> in the <S%H4013>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> throughout all <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.
